page.title: 15ATTITUDES TO LIFE
page.content: PEOPLES ATTITUDES TO LIFE SEEM TO VARY GREATLY.SOME WANT BETTER FACILITIES SUCH AS A HEALTH CENTRE AND A LIBRARY.OTHERS FEEL THAT THE NEARBY MAIN ROADS BRING UNWANTED VISITORS AND VEHICLES.MANY WOULD LIKE PUBLIC TRANSPORT FACILITIES IMPROVED TO GIVE THEM A CHANCE TO GET OUT OF THE AREA.SOME WANT BETTER SHOPPING FACILITIES TO SAVE THEM TRAVEL TO EXETER FOR THEIR SHOPPING. THE YOUNG PEOPLE FELT THAT THEY OUGHT TO HAVE SOMETHING PROVIDED FOR THEM TO DO. THE MAJORITY ENJOYED THE QUIET LIFE OF THE VILLAGE AND THE FEELING OF COMMUNITY SPIRIT WAS STRONG.
